      • restorePassword

        public boolean restorePassword(java.lang.String mail,
                               java.lang.String hashPassword,
                               java.lang.String newPassword)
        Changes user password if hash password and mail of specific user are correct.
        Specified by:
        restorePassword in interface UserManagerService
        Parameters:
        mail - of client we want to restore the password.
        hashPassword - of client we want to restore the password.
        newPassword - we want to set instead of old one.
        Returns:
        true if action is successfully, otherwise false.
